name: Great Wall of China
description: A series of fortifications built to protect Chinese states from invasions.

name: Petra
description: An ancient city famous for its rock-cut architecture and water conduit system.

name: Christ the Redeemer
description: An iconic Art Deco statue of Jesus Christ overlooking Rio de Janeiro.

name: Machu Picchu
description: An Incan citadel set high in the Andes Mountains.

name: Chichen Itza
description: A large pre-Columbian city built by the Maya civilization.

name: Roman Colosseum
description: A massive amphitheatre used for gladiatorial contests and public spectacles.

name: Taj Mahal
description: A white marble mausoleum built by Mughal Emperor Shah Jahan in memory of his wife.
